message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 seems fair.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, considering the inflation
I understand the inflation affects us differently Bob, but your offer was a bit too skewed. This is my counter-offer.
Considering the growing inflation difference, I'll try again, slightly more in my favor
Bob, it's clear we're at an impasse. Let's stop wasting time with the back and forth. A 50/50 split is the fairest option considering the inflation is impacting me more.
